item.title: How to Structure Product Teams
item.author: info@dataingenio.com (Tama Francisquez)
item.description: It doesn’t matter if you work in a startup, scale-up, or a larger organization, in any case, the success of a product team usually equals growing such a team. These changes bring challenges and opportunities to organizations. Here are some strategies for organizing product teams, what they optimize, and in which situation to use them.
